Function Documentation

img_void IOBLOCK_CalculateInterruptInformation ( ioblock_sBlockDescriptor *  psBlockDescriptor  ) 

Description:
This function sets up the following elements of the block context structure pointed to by psBlockContext: sDeviceISRInfo, sDMACChannelISRInfo, and ui32IntMasks, based on the values supplied by psBlockDescriptor.

psBlockContext->psBlockDescriptor must be a valid pointer to a completed block descriptor.

Parameters:
psBlockContext A pointer to a block context structure.
Returns:
None.
